name: NU_CommunicableDiseaseExposureNonspecificICD10CM
title: NU_Communicable Disease Exposure [Nonspecific] (ICD10CM)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains diagnoses, problems, events, or findings that represent that the patient has had exposure to communicable disease regardless of the clinical presentation of the condition),(Data Element Scope: Diagnoses, problems, events, or findings documented in a clinical record.),(Inclusion Criteria: communicable disease; exposure),(Exclusion Criteria: infection; disease/condition specific exposure)
